title: Mayura Jhumkaalu: Sapphire Dreams Earrings
materials: Cultured Pearls. Featuring Hyderabadi Polish for a rich luster.
features: These handcrafted jhumka earrings showcase a captivating blend of traditional and contemporary design. The design features a parrot (Mayura) motif perched elegantly at the top, embellished with emeralds. Polki diamonds add a subtle brilliance, while a cascade of sapphire beads creates a mesmerizing effect. A single pearl hangs delicately at the bottom of each earring. The intricate gold filigree work adds depth and dimension.
colors: Pink (Ruby Accent). A traditional color palette exuding regality.
occasions: and other traditional celebrations (pandugalu). They also make a stunning statement piece for upscale events.
description: These earrings are a testament to the artistry of South Indian craftsmanship. The Mayura motif symbolizes beauty and grace, making them an auspicious choice. The combination of Sapphires, emeralds, and Polki diamonds offer timeless elegance and value. These jhumkaalu can be passed down as treasured heirlooms (sampradayaabharanalu).
